question.title: Keycloak's AuthorizationResource.authorize processes only 100 resources
question.body:
I'm using Keycloak 26.0.8 with Java SDK.

I'm calling AuthorizationResource.authorize() with permissionResourceFormat=uri. If, in the client I'm querying, there are more than 100 resources that fit the URI in the permissions request, Keycloak processes only the first 100 resources it finds, so I'm getting a partial response.

My questions:

  • Is there an option for pagination in such case?
  • Is there an option to change the limit of 100, or even remove it completely?
  • Is there some best-practice to handle such case when i need the complete list of permissions?

Thanks
